chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 mini with the above problem:

I would like to send the device back because the battery capacity, according to various battery tools (e.g. coconu battery) as well as analyzed data under Settings/Info/Data Security/Analysis, only shows 72-76% at present. However, it still displays 100% in Settings/Battery settings. Therefore, something seems to have been tampered with. As a result, my trust in the manufacturer's sincerity has been lost.

Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €60 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hello,

When refunding money, you are prohibited from making deductions from the money.

Please do not make any deductions.

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market
